entities.name: potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as someone who failed to realize that a book was in their dormitory.

entities.name: longbottom
entities.description: A boy who received a book from the speaker and could have helped Potter with his problem.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf mentioned as having given Potter a Christmas present.

relationships.description: Longbottom could have helped Potter with his problem, but Potter did not ask for help.
The speaker mentions that Dobby gave Potter a Christmas present.
